name: Broken Circuit (Kjelstroem Games)
description:
The circuits are broken! Fix them to turn the lights back on!

Broken Circuit is a cute, fun and simple puzzle game. Tap wires to rotate them and let the power flow to the disconnected lamps. Compete on time with an infinite amount of levels spiking in difficulty.

Now available for IOS & Android! Changelog  Version 1.0.7 (22/9-2019): -Added new background soundtrack -Cleaned up lamp sound effect and added variations
